A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I can't begin to tell you how disappointed I was with this movie. The way characters have been treated in this new trilogy and really sad and this movie completely disrespects them. I get moving on to new characters but at least give the old ones worthwhile passings. That's unfortunately only the tip of the iceberg when addressing the problems with this movie.\n\nPlot holes are almost without end in his this movie with many situations being such obvious lazy writing that you wonder how this script got green-lighted. The build-ups from the last movie are never even payed off in any meaningful way. Extremely disappointed with the direction things are going.
